mapinfo.detailsText:
Players begin dangerously close to one another on a small landmass low in resources. Across the river, however, an incredible wealth of resources can be found. Local trade routes may prove to be lucrative and local religious groups are able to provide useful technologies and soldiers. 
 
 
 
 Outlaws: Wokou Horseman / Wokou Monk 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk 
 


 Map by dansil92
